alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fall River County through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 3 miles west of Smithwick, or 13 miles southeast of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Smithwick around 205 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oelrichs and Hay Canyon Butte. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
